section.p: To develop Openmeetings you need to import maven project into Eclipse

section.name: Tips and Gotchas
section.p: To compile only client you can run following command:
section.source: mvn package -pl openmeetings-flash # compiles a complete package into the folder openmeetings-flash/target
section.p: In case you would like to develop Openmeetings you need to run "unpacked" build:
After modifications are made you can run "quick" build:
Any number of projects can be specified during build:
section.source: mvn package -pl openmeetings-util -pl openmeetings-db -pl openmeetings-core -pl openmeetings-install -pl openmeetings-service -pl openmeetings-web -pl openmeetings-server -pl openmeetings-webservice -Dquick=true -Ddb=mysql -Dwicket.mode=DEVELOPMENT
section.p:
Working behind a proxy: If you are sitting behind a proxy you should add some proxy settings before starting the build process.
For SVN Command Line Client (From CollabNet 1.7) see: https://ctf6latest.collab.net/internal-help/index.jsp?topic=/teamforge610/faq/client_proxy_settings.html
